instructions: Wake your iPhone. On an iPhone with Face ID, swipe up from the bottom edge and pause to show the App Switcher. (On an iPhone with a Home button, double-click the Home button to show the App Switcher.) Tap the button at the bottom of the screen to open Mail.

On your child s Android device, open the Google Home app . At the bottom, tap Account . Under "Local devices," tap the device you want to link to your child's voice. Tap the blue banner and then Continue . Tap your account. Follow the steps.
On your Android device, open the Family Link app . Select your child's name. Find the device. Below its name, tap Settings . Turn on Personal results .
On an Android device, touch and hold the Home button. Tap . Choose an app. In the "Details" section, look for the "For families" badge .
